A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This will be my first and last Rotten Tomato review. But TLJ was such a disappointing movie that I feel I have to warn other fans. TLJ is NOT a continuation of The Force Awakens\, does not have pace of Rogue One\, and most of all feels like a pilot episode to Star Wars TV show. I started the movie full of excitement and expectations but as it (slowly) progressed\, I got more and more (insert negative feeling here). Around halfway\, I thought to myself that I should watch it as a non-Star Wars fan. Maybe my expectations were tainted by my fascination of the SW universe? That didn't work and even for an average movie goer\, TLJ must feel so bad with poor plot progression\, tasteless humor\, confusing plot lines. \nIn conclusion\, TFA left me longing for TLJ. TLJ killed off my interest in the future SW enterprise. Good job\, Disney.
